name: Format\LinkedArticle
description: A relationship between your article and another Apple News article.

properties.name: relationship
properties.description: The type of relationship between the article and the linked document.

properties.name: URL
properties.description: The URL for the link. This link can  either be an Apple News link, like https://apple.news/[article_id], or a link to an article on your website, as long as the website link matches the canonicalURL metadata property of the linked article. For more information about canonicalURL, see Metadata.
